title: The Protected occupiers of adjoining / nearby non buildable Slum Rehabilitation Area shall be accommodated thereafter
clause_text: The Protected occupiers of adjoining / nearby non buildable Slum Rehabilitation Area shall be accommodated thereafter.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE NON PROTECTED OCCUPIERS
